catalogitems.name: Potatoes
catalogitems.description: Freshly harvested from local farms, our potatoes are rich in flavor and perfect for roasting, mashing, or frying. Their creamy texture and earthy taste make them a versatile ingredient for countless recipes.

catalogitems.name: Tomatoes
catalogitems.description: Bursting with vibrant color and juicy sweetness, our tomatoes are picked at peak ripeness to ensure maximum flavor. Whether sliced for sandwiches, diced for salsa, or slow-roasted for pasta sauce, these tomatoes elevate any dish.

catalogitems.name: Carrots
catalogitems.description: Crisp and crunchy, our carrots are packed with natural sweetness and vibrant orange color. Enjoy them raw as a healthy snack, grated into salads, or roasted with herbs for a savory side dish.

catalogitems.name: Batats
catalogitems.description: Known for their natural sweetness and velvety texture, our sweet potatoes are a nutritious addition to any meal. Whether baked, mashed, or grilled, these batats add a delicious twist to classic recipes.

catalogitems.name: Taroes
catalogitems.description: With their nutty flavor and starchy texture, taroes are a staple in many cuisines. Boil them for a comforting soup, steam and mash for a creamy side dish, or fry into crispy chips for a tasty snack.

catalogitems.name: Roots of lotos
catalogitems.description: Delicate and mildly sweet, lotus roots add a unique crunch to dishes. Slice them thinly for stir-fries, pickle them for a tangy snack, or batter and fry them for crispy lotus root chips.
